channel.title: NPC HELP, online status
channel.description: heyyy i have a code on mine that makes npcs sya if im online or not and when i logg in to my server there is no npc's at all that sya it . i have to spawn them. can somone give me a code to make it so they stand in onw spot and just say if im online or not>?

item.title: NPC HELP, online status
item.dc:creator: @mik77 mik77
item.description:
@mik77 wrote:

thanks chasssy ill try that.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2009, 06:49:17 pm[/size][hr]chaseyyy i tryed that code, and still nothing like there isnt even anyone standinganywere. in that code would that make them stand infront of the training spot in varrock. from pimpscape.?

or anm i not sppost to put that in NPCHanler. am i suppost to put it in a diff older?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC HELP, online status
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 593) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("username")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "OFFLINE"; } } }

Read full topic

autospawn.cfg

spawn = NPCID coord x coord y height? 0 0 0 1

something like that
